translation.en: [narrator] Hollywood, California. Tinseltown is boomtown.
translation.ja: 〝時事ニュース〞 ハリウッドは金ピカの新興都市 ハリウッドは金ピカの新興都市

translation.en: During the war, Los Angeles grew as a hub of wartime industry,
translation.ja: ＬＡ(ロサンゼルス)は戦時産業の中心地でした

translation.en: producing all manner of aircraft and ammunition to support our fighting men overseas.
translation.ja: 海外で戦う兵士たちに航空機や砲弾を提供しました

translation.en: The war now over, many of these starry-eyed dreamers hope to make it in moving pictures,
translation.ja: 終戦後 夢見る若者たちは映画産業に憧れ―

translation.en: swarming like so many locusts outside the studio gates,
translation.ja: スタジオの門前に押し寄せます

translation.en: hoping to score a role as an extra
translation.ja: エキストラから始めて―

translation.en: and become the next Paul Muni or Hedy Lamarr.
translation.ja: 第２のポール･ムニを夢見ます

translation.en: The studio system is king,
translation.ja: スタジオ･システムは王様です

translation.en: and if you make all the right moves, you too could be living in Beverly Hills,
translation.ja: スタジオ･システムは王様です ビバリーヒルズに豪邸を建てることも―

translation.en: splashing in your private pool with invitations to all the right parties.
translation.ja: ビバリーヒルズに豪邸を建てることも― 可能にしてくれます

translation.en: You might even become immortalized at Grauman's Chinese Theatre.
translation.ja: 永遠に名を刻むこともできます

translation.en: The rewards for ambition are bountiful here in the beautiful Southern California sun.
translation.ja: ここでは成功の報酬は無限大なのです

translation.en: [man] Pardon me. Beg your pardon.
Sorry, excuse me.
Excuse me, pardon me.
Excuse me, coming through. Sorry.
-Hiya, Lou! -Hey, Jackie. Get over here, kid.
translation.ja: ルー！ ジャック 来いよ

translation.en: -Say, what time'd you get here? -About an hour ago,
translation.ja: いつ着いた？ １時間前だ　早い方がいい

translation.en: -early birds getting worms and such. -Sure.
translation.ja: １時間前だ　早い方がいい ああ

translation.en: They're still lensing the John Farrow picture with Alan Ladd and Donna Reed.
translation.ja: ジョン･ファロー監督がレンズ中だよ

translation.en: -"Lensing"? -Lensing.
translation.ja: え？ ハリウッドでは映画製作を そう呼ぶ

translation.en: It's how you say "filmmaking" in Hollywood-ese. You gotta learn the lingo.
translation.ja: ハリウッドでは映画製作を そう呼ぶ

translation.en: Billy Wilder is helming a picture with Emperor Franz--
translation.ja: ビリー･ワイルダーはかじ取り中

translation.en: -"Helming"? -Directing.
Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, it's gonna be boffo BO.
translation.ja: クロスビーとフォンテインだバッフォー間違いなし

translation.en: And she thinks we're gonna start the day on the big ballroom scene. Lots of extras. People standing by the punch bowl,
translation.ja: 舞踏会のシーンではエキストラが必要だろう

translation.en: folks crossing the hallway when they enter the big door. I think I got a real shot at that one.
translation.ja: 廊下を歩く役ならもらえそうだ

translation.en: What about a western or war picture? Something like that. They making any of those?
translation.ja: 西部劇や戦争映画は作ってないのか？

translation.en: You don't say "making a movie," Jack. You produce a movie, "produce."
You gotta know this stuff if you wanna make it big time.
translation.ja: 成功したいなら言葉を学べ

translation.en: Shh, shh, shh! Here she comes, the old gorgon herself.
Okay, listen up. I'm only gonna say this once.
translation.ja: 一度しか言わないからね

translation.en: Rule number one, do not look at the camera.
translation.ja: ルール１ カメラを見ないで

translation.en: Rule number two, do not talk to the director.
translation.ja: ルール２監督に話しかけない

translation.en: In fact, a good rule of thumb is to not talk at all.
translation.ja: ルール２監督に話しかけない 口を開かないのが一番

translation.en: Rule number three, if you see a platter of food on the sound stage, do not eat it.
translation.ja: ルール３現場の食べ物は食べるな

translation.en: That is not for you. That is for the actors and the crew.
translation.ja: 俳優と撮影クルーの物だから

translation.en: If you see food on the set, do not eat that. That is a prop.
translation.ja: セットの食べ物も小道具だからダメ

translation.en: Now we have that out of the way. Today, we're lensing a scene from a war pic.
translation.ja: 今日は戦争映画をレンズする

translation.en: -Lensing. -[woman] Seven were saved
where the plane goes down, and a bunch of passengers flail around in the water and then die, okay?
translation.ja: 飛行機が墜落し大勢が海に落ちて死ぬ

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -All right, uh, you,
-and you... -[man] Thanks!
You, you and you...
translation.ja: あなたと あなたと あなた

translation.en: you...
uh, you...
and...
-you. -[cymbal crashes]
[woman] Okay, thank you very much. That's it for today. See y'all tomorrow.
translation.ja: 今日は ここまでまた明日 来て

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Roswell. Beg your pardon, Jack Castello.
translation.ja: ロズウェルさん僕はジャック･カステロ

translation.en: I think I'd be great in your war picture. The drowning scene? You see, I fought at Anzio.
translation.ja: アンツィオの戦いに参加した戦争映画なら任せて

translation.en: -Oh, you have training? -Sure, Fort Benning, Georgia.
translation.ja: 訓練経験が？ ＦＢ基地で

translation.en: Mm, I mean acting training.
-You got any of that? -Well, no.
translation.ja: 演技訓練の話よ いえ

translation.en: Good-looking kid like you, you think you just gotta show up and poof,
translation.ja: 美男子だから成功すると思ってる？

translation.en: you're a movie star, huh? Well, that ain't how it works.
translation.ja: 美男子だから成功すると思ってる？ 見てくれだけで経験のない俳優志望は―

translation.en: Pretty face, but no training.
translation.ja: 見てくれだけで経験のない俳優志望は―

translation.en: [chuckles] Kid, you're a dime a dozen.
[man] Look, first breaks are tough in this town. Don't beat yourself up.
translation.ja: 最初が一番 難しいんだ落ち込むな

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Already taken care of.
translation.ja: 必要ない　支払われてる

translation.en: -What does he want? -Don't know.
Maybe he thought you looked thirsty.
[clerk] Now, you're looking for a loan of about $20,000?
[woman] Yes, that's right. Just enough for a modest home.
translation.ja: ええ 家を買いたくて

translation.en: [clerk] Swell, let's take a look at your application.
I see you're a veteran, Mr. Castello. Thank you for your service.
translation.ja: 退役軍人ですね貢献に感謝します

translation.en: And Mrs. Castello, you are a waitress.
Yes, and I intend to keep working until the baby arrives.
translation.ja: 出産まで続けるつもりよ

translation.en: [clerk] So, you're expecting? Well, congratulations.
translation.ja: ご妊娠中ですか　おめでたい

translation.en: And Mr. Castello, it says here you're a film actor. Any pictures I might know you from?
translation.ja: ご主人は俳優だそうですが出演作は？

translation.en: Ah, probably not. Uh, to me, it's not about the notoriety, it's about the craft.
translation.ja: 知らないと思うよ評判より質を重視してる

translation.en: It's about showing up to work every day, you know.
translation.ja: 追加俳優としてとにかく露出を…

translation.en: -And for a super, that can mean-- -I'm sorry, a what?
translation.ja: 追加俳優としてとにかく露出を… 追加俳優？

translation.en: Oh, a supernumerary. A supernumerary.
-It means "extra." -It means "background actor."
translation.ja: エキストラよ 正式には“背景俳優”

translation.en: That's the proper term.
In many ways, we contribute to the reality of the scene even more so than the principal actors.
translation.ja: 主演俳優以上にリアリティーに貢献してる

translation.en: But I don't see any income here.
Uh, no, presently not, but, uh...
But hey! I've got a casting tomorrow, and if they pick me, that's ten dollars in my pocket!
translation.ja: 明日 採用されれば10ドルは もらえる

translation.en: Very well. Uh...
Unfortunately, Mr. and Mrs. Castello,
translation.ja: 残念ですが 当行では―

translation.en: we would be unable to provide a loan of the size that you're seeking based on your current income.
translation.ja: ご希望の融資額はこの収入では貸し出せません

translation.en: Listen, thank you for your time, sir.
One of those days, huh?
Bartender, two more, please.
-Why are you buying me drinks? -To thank you for your service.
translation.ja: なぜ おごる？ 軍役への礼だどこで戦いを？

translation.en: You served, didn't you? Where'd you fight?
translation.ja: 軍役への礼だどこで戦いを？

translation.en: -Anzio. -Anzio! [chuckles]
translation.ja: アンツィオ イタリアか

translation.en: Anzio was rough.
Ernie.
-Jack. -Nice to meet you.
translation.ja: ジャック よろしく

translation.en: I wanted to fight. Tried to enlist and everything, but they wouldn't take me. -Said my cock was too big. -[coughing]
translation.ja: 戦いたかったが巨根すぎて入隊できなかった

translation.en: Yeah, surprised me too. I mean, it's big.
Twelve inches, soup to nuts, and not floppy either.
translation.ja: だが30センチ以上あるし太い

translation.en: I get hard as a fucking rock.
Are you for real? What are you talking about?
-I got a very big dick. -[Jack] No, I...
translation.ja: ペニスの話 違う　なぜ そんな話をしてるのか聞いてる

translation.en: I heard you when you said that. I'm wondering why. Why are you... coming up to a stranger in a bar, talking about how big your cock is?
translation.ja: 違う　なぜ そんな話をしてるのか聞いてる

translation.en: -Because you asked me. -Did I? Does not sound like me.
translation.ja: 聞かれたから 記憶にない

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is I know a hard-luck fella when I sees one. I used to be right where you are.
translation.ja: とにかく君の苦労は分かる昔の私と同じだ

translation.en: I used to worry about my wife and kids... They're grown now. She's dead, God bless her.
translation.ja: 妻子のために身を粉にしたが子は独立 妻は死亡

translation.en: Good woman. But I've been where you are, wondering what my life was gonna mean.
translation.ja: 当時は君と同じく人生の目的を見失ってたよ

translation.en: -What do you want? -I run a service station.
translation.ja: 用件は？ 経営してる給油所が大成功しててね

translation.en: And business is booming!
translation.ja: 経営してる給油所が大成功しててね

translation.en: I could use a good-looking fella like yourself pumping gas.
translation.ja: 美形の従業員が欲しい

translation.en: Why do you need someone good-looking to pump gas?
My gas station specializes in good-looking attendants.
translation.ja: 美形が給油するのが売りなのさ

translation.en: It's my corner of the market, it's why we do good business. This is Hollywood, kid! It's what people want.
translation.ja: ハリウッドだからなそれが成功の理由だ

translation.en: It's why they left their cow towns where they grew up.
translation.ja: 皆 美を求めて来てる

translation.en: They don't want some fatso looking under their hood, just reeking of sweat, grease under their fingernails.
translation.ja: 薄汚い中年に車を触ってほしいわけがない

translation.en: It's an intimate act, if you think about it,
and, get this...
They'll tip big for it.
This is for you.
Thanks.
What I offer is a vision of a new America.
translation.ja: これが新しいアメリカのスタイル

translation.en: The America that you fought for.
You're very kind, but no.
Okay.
Citrus and Normandy, if you change your mind. Golden Tip Gas.
translation.ja: 店名はゴールデンチップガス気が変わったら連絡を

translation.en: It's not our anniversary, is it?
They cut our electricity, Jack.
Well... sure is romantic, baby, huh?
translation.ja: ロマンチックでいい雰囲気だ

translation.en: Don't bother. You already knocked me up.
translation.ja: もう子作りは必要ない

translation.en: Cold wieners are on the table for you.
[Ernie] That looks good.
Kid, I gotta tell you, you look fantastic. Handsome, young, brimming with optimism.
translation.ja: 完ぺきだよ　男前で若く希望にあふれてる

translation.en: And, oh, by the way, you're clean, right? No venereal disease?
translation.ja: ちなみに性病は ないよな？

translation.en: Okay, what is-- What do you mean? What are you talking about?
translation.ja: なぜ そんな質問を？

translation.en: Look, kid, this town is all about dreams, right? You know that.
translation.ja: ここは夢を作り 売る町だ

translation.en: And some of my customers don't just come here for gas. They have, uh, fantasies and desires.
translation.ja: 給油以外にも夢や欲望を持つ客が来る

translation.en: And for them, it ain't enough to watch a fantasy up on the big screen.
translation.ja: 客は映画では満足せず実体験を望んでる

translation.en: They want it for themselves, and I provide that for them.
translation.ja: 客は映画では満足せず実体験を望んでる 私は人に夢を与える映画製作者みたいだろ

translation.en: In a way, I'm no different than Louis B. Mayer, you know what I mean?
translation.ja: 私は人に夢を与える映画製作者みたいだろ

translation.en: No, Ernie, I have no idea what you mean.
You see, some of them say a secret code word. You get in the car with them. Have a drink maybe, or sometimes...
translation.ja: 合言葉を言われたら客の車に入り 一緒に過ごす

translation.en: sometimes you have to service 'em.
You gotta... you gotta be kidding me.
What? You don't like women?
Sure, I like women, that's why I married one.
translation.ja: いや 結婚してるよ

translation.en: [Ernie] All right, so let me ask you...
translation.ja: では聞こう　浮気の経験は？

translation.en: -You never cheated on her? -No.
translation.ja: では聞こう　浮気の経験は？ ない

translation.en: Okay, I'm going to ask you again.
You never cheated on her?
[woman moaning] Oh, Jack.
No, uh... One time. One time, I was... I was on leave, I was drunk.
translation.ja: 一度だけだ　酔っ払ってた

translation.en: Then you're good! First time's always the hardest, and you got that outta the way. You're gonna be great.
translation.ja: 一度目が最も難しいんだだから大丈夫

translation.en: Oh, here's one right here.
Jack, today is your lucky day. -[bell dings] -This one's special, take it from me.
translation.ja: ジャック ラッキーだな上客だぞ

translation.en: No.
No, no, no. Ernie, I'm not doing this.
I came here to be in pictures, I'm gonna be a movie star. This, this is not for me. I-- I appreciate...
translation.ja: 僕はスターになりたいんだこんなのは できない

translation.en: Look, you hired me to pump gas, I'll pump gas. This, forget it. So long.
translation.ja: こんな仕事なら辞めさせてもらう

translation.en: [Ernie] All right, but you just missed out on 100 bucks.
My customers pay twice that,
and you and me, we split it, 50-50.
translation.ja: 私と君で山分けするんだ

translation.en: So, are you gonna take it? Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
translation.ja: やるか？他の従業員に譲るか？

translation.en: Fuck me.
[Ernie] Attaboy!
You're gonna do great.
-Shut up. -[Ernie] Let me know how it goes.
Fill 'er up?
I wanna go to Dreamland.
Okay.
You'll do nicely.
Welcome.
Where are we going?
I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.ja: 部屋を予約してあるの

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
That's the fun of it.
So, how long have you been here?
Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles? Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.ja: ミズーリ州から数ヵ月前に来ました

translation.en: Let me guess... you came here to be a movie star.
translation.ja: 映画スターになりたくて来たんでしょ

translation.en: How did you know?
Takes one to know one.
I was in pictures. Silent films. Good ones, too.
translation.ja: 私はサイレント映画に何本も出演した

translation.en: But then came the talkies.
I had one screen test, and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.ja: “他民族はトーキーに向かない”と言われた

translation.en: A little "Jewey" was the word they used.
I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.ja: ここはユダヤ人が作った町と言っても無駄だった

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star. Nobody thought they were pretty.
translation.ja: ユダヤ女はスターになれないとされた

translation.en: So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
met a low-level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.ja: そこで出世予定の低級役員に出会い―

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl. A goddamn script reader.
translation.ja: 製作会社の下働き以外仕事はないと言われた

translation.en: I said, "Fuck this town, I'm done."
He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.ja: 彼に妊娠させられ責任を取らせたの

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.ja: 私の代わりにスターになった

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
Why do you want to be a movie star?
translation.ja: なぜ映画スターになりたい？

translation.en: You want an honest answer?
Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.ja: どうせ裸になるんだから

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
translation.ja: じゃあ正直に話します

translation.en: all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
translation.ja: 家族や教師にバカだと思われてきた

translation.en: My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
translation.ja: 家族や教師にバカだと思われてきた どうも

translation.en: All telling me I was lucky I was good-looking.
And I knew what they meant,
that that was all I had going for me.
I just want to do something big, you know? Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world. Do something that matters.
translation.ja: 重大なことに関わって自分の価値を証明したい

translation.en: [chuckling] So movies...
you think they matter?
You kidding?
I know they do.
When you're walking through your life, it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.ja: 生きてると 人生は無意味と思うこともある

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything. But when I was a kid... I grew up on a farm in Missouri,
translation.ja: 僕は農場育ちだから映画を見るのに―

translation.en: so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
translation.ja: 車で30分の道のりだった

translation.en: And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.ja: 人生の価値が理解できた

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
It was like there was something somewhere out there... waiting for me.
translation.ja: この先に希望があると教えてくれた

translation.en: That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
translation.ja: そのために生きるのだと

translation.en: I held my first hand at a movie theater, I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I... I don't know.
translation.ja: 初めてのデートもキスも映画館だった

translation.en: What I do know is this: every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.ja: 映画館に行く度人として成長できる

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
Can I ask you a question?
Only if you come and sit by me.
I'm paying for company.
Why are you here?
I mean, doing this with me. [chuckles]
You got a husband you don't like?
Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.ja: 金持ちの生活に慣れすぎた

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.ja: 夫はもう私に触れる気もない

translation.en: So what's a girl to do? Bridge? Parcheesi?
translation.ja: トランプ遊びでもしてればいいのかしら

translation.en: I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.ja: 使用人を誘惑もしたけど―

translation.en: This is much easier. Less complicated.
translation.ja: こういう関係の方が楽でいい

translation.en: You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
it's kinda like you're asking to be caught.
Maybe I am.
Maybe I want to make my husband jealous.
Maybe I want him to know... that someone else desires me.
translation.ja: 私を欲する男がいると夫に分からせたい

translation.en: And that I'm still alive...
with so much more to give.
You're married.
Yeah, I am.
Do you feel guilty?
I gotta provide.
Then provide.
Yeah.
Listen...
How exactly do we, uh, get started?
Well, first you take your shoes off.
Oh, yeah. Got it.
My...
aren't I a lucky gal?
Listen, before we--
Can I ask you a question?
Just 'cause you've been through it.
You think I got what it takes? I mean, to make it in this town?
translation.ja: 僕に成功の見込みはあると思う？

translation.en: Who can say?
But what I do know, Jack,
is you have a strong light inside you.
translation.ja: あなたが光を秘めてること

translation.en: Shine that light on me.
Make me feel like I matter.
Even if it's a lie.
-Okay. -[chuckles]
Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.ja: サミー リッキーよくやった

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, -Rough Ronny. -[Ronny] Thank you.
Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
translation.ja: おかえり　上首尾と聞いた

translation.en: And here's this for your trouble.
translation.ja: これが苦労へのご褒美だ

translation.en: Not too bad, right?
Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten-year regular of yours truly.
translation.ja: エイヴィスは強烈だろ10年来の常連だ

translation.en: No, it was, uh... She was kind.
It was actually all right.
Good. In that case, I got another one for you.
Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
translation.ja: 店の裏にいる10分で済むさ

translation.en: -Right now? -Right now!
All yours, Kemosabe.
Well, hello there.
Ernie, there's been a mistake. [stammers] There's some guy in there.
translation.ja: 間違いだ　男がいた

translation.en: That's not just "some guy." That's Cole Porter. He's a living legend.
translation.ja: ただの男じゃないあのコール･ポーター様だ

translation.en: The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes... Yesterday I heard you humming "Don't Fence Me In."
translation.ja: 「陽気な離婚」にも「エニシング･ゴーズ」にも

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it!
So?
So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.ja: いいお客さんだよ早く行きなさい

translation.en: -Don't keep him waiting! -Are you...
translation.ja: いいお客さんだよ早く行きなさい まさか 僕があの男性に…

translation.en: Are you telling me you expect me to...
translation.ja: まさか 僕があの男性に…

translation.en: Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
translation.ja: 無理だ　やらないよ

translation.en: I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me! I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.ja: 僕は そんな仕事はしない何と言われようと

translation.en: -End of story. -Okay.
translation.ja: 僕は そんな仕事はしない何と言われようと そうか

translation.en: I see how it goes. You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.ja: だが私が雇用主だ私が決定する

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.ja: 今月は人手不足で私は咳(せき)が出る

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.ja: 代役を探す余裕もない

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.ja: あの国の宝に奉仕しないなら代員は君が探してこい

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
translation.ja: さもなきゃ 給料没収だ

translation.en: and you can get the fuck out of here!
That suits me fine. I quit.
translation.ja: 構わない　辞めるよ

translation.en: Yeah, well, good luck then, kid! I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
translation.ja: 私だってスターになりたかったんだ

translation.en: Sweetheart.
What are you doing here?
Doctor's appointment?
Jeez, yeah. Um...
Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
[man] You two own your own home?
[Henrietta] No, we're just renting at the moment.
translation.ja: 〝ハイラム･アルグレン産婦人科〞 今は賃貸よ

translation.en: Cervix feels just right.
translation.ja: 〝ハイラム･アルグレン産婦人科〞 〝ハイラム･アルグレン産婦人科〞 子宮頸は問題なし 子宮頸は問題なし

translation.en: Well, it's probably just as well,
translation.ja: まあ それが賢明だ

translation.en: because you know what they say, having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.ja: 子育ては住宅ローンくらいお金がかかるからね

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
Now, just relax.
Starting on the nursery yet?
No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.ja: ワンルームだから場所がない

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.ja: 出産と同時に新居探しを？

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
[doctor] They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
translation.ja: 粉ミルクも値上がりした節約しないとな

translation.en: Uh-oh.
What?
Twins.
-[Henrietta] What? -What?
-Yep. Two heartbeats. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.ja: 心音が２つ 冗談だろ

translation.en: -[loud thud] -Jack!
-Hiya, Jack. -Flo.
[chuckles] How's Hollywood treating you?
Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
-Mm-hm. -Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.ja: カネはないけど衣装が必要なんだ

translation.en: What kind of costume?
-One, please. -[man] Um...
Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
translation.ja: 見回りなら無料ですよ

translation.en: Damn right, I don't have to pay.
How are you today?
I'm fine, how are you?
-I'm well. -Yeah?
You got any money, honey?
Sure do.
I bet you do.
Get out of here.
Shit!
You're coming with me.
Shit.
Walk.
-Are you going to put me in jail? -Shut up. Keep walking.
translation.ja: 刑務所に？ 黙って歩け

translation.en: -Got a squad car somewhere, or-- -I said can it!
-We're going right around the corner. -Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.ja: 角まで行く シュワブスへ？

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
What?
Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here? Am I getting arrested?
translation.ja: どういうこと？逮捕されるのか？

translation.en: Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast or I'm taking you downtown to the lock-up.
translation.ja: 正直に白状しなければ留置場にブチ込む

translation.en: Hey, Jack, it's ready.
Let's go.
Hey, Jack, what's with the get-up?
Nothing. It's just my uniform.
I wear it when I'm on duty.
I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.ja: 彼にシャーリーテンプルを

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
Explain yourself.
-What do you want me to say? -Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.ja: 何を？ きっかけからだ

translation.en: Okay.
I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
I wanted to be a writer.
Still do.
I wrote a script, you know? Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
translation.ja: ペグ･エントウィスルを題材に１本 書いた

translation.en: a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.ja: ハリウッドで挫折し自殺した若き女優

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.ja: 共感できる人物だから題材にした

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
But a hundred bucks... ain't much,
and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.ja: スタジオは黒人と契約したがらない

translation.en: I got...
Can I smoke?
Yeah, go ahead.
Thank you.
You need money?
I get a dollar a script down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.ja: ボードビルの寸劇は１本書いて１ドルだ

translation.en: But that's once a week, so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.ja: その仕事も週１回だけ体を売るしかない

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.ja: パーシングスクエアじゃすぐ逮捕される

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.ja: だから映画館でやってるんだ

translation.en: Beats washing dishes, and I like doing it.
translation.ja: 稼ぎもいいしやってて楽しい

translation.en: Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.ja: どうせ働くなら楽しいことをすべきだ

translation.en: I'm discerning.
translation.ja: 俺は見る目があるし容姿や清潔感も…

translation.en: -My tricks gotta be good-looking, clean-- -So, you're a gigolo.
translation.ja: 俺は見る目があるし容姿や清潔感も… 男娼か

translation.en: I'm a writer.
Call it whatever you want.
I ain't ashamed.
I know who I am.
Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
What the hell kind of cop are you?
translation.ja: 警官が売春斡旋(あっせん)を？

translation.en: I know a fella who owns a gas station. You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.ja: 給油所で たまに給油以上のことをするんだ

translation.en: Pay is good, very good. More than what you're charging.
And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
You ain't no real cop.
Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
translation.ja: 一つ 確認させてくれ

translation.en: Pall Malls.
Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
Yeah.
Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.ja: 興奮したフリなんて誰でも やってる

translation.en: -He's paying for it. -Okay.
I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie.
First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
I'm an actor.
But, until that moment just then, you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
translation.ja: 途中まで警官だと信じてただろ？

translation.en: What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop... right?
translation.ja: 僕が いい俳優である証拠だ

translation.en: Sweet beans in a basket.
translation.ja: いい人材を見つけたな

translation.en: He'll do the guy stuff?
Ask him.
If the price is right.
-50-50. -[scoffs] I'm worth more than that, 60-40.
translation.ja: ５割 やる ６割で考えてやる

translation.en: I like this kid. Enterprising.
Okay, deal.
Ernie West.
-Archie Coleman. -You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
translation.ja: アーチーだ 君は売れる　見れば分かるよ

translation.en: I can tell just by looking at you.
translation.ja: 君は売れる　見れば分かるよ

translation.en: What's the password again?
"Dreamland."
[Ernie] He's all yours, go get him.
I knew you'd be back.
They always come back.
How's it going?
Can I help you?
Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
The street? Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
translation.ja: それなら あっちの方角だ

translation.en: [scoffs] You mean Dreamland?
Yeah. Dreamland.
Okay.
What can I do for you?
Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
You're not interested in a black man?
No, I'm just a little nervous.
What's your name?
Roy. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.ja: ロイ･フィッツジェラルド

translation.en: Archie.
This your place?
Yeah.
I'm renting month-to-month. I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.ja: 月ぎめで借りてる今は これが精一杯だ

translation.en: What do you want?
-What do you mean? -I mean what do you want to do...
to me?
Or what do you want me to do to you?
[scoffs] Oh, you're, uh...
I like how straightforward you are.
[chuckles] Yeah. Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.ja: 払った額に見合った満足を提供したいだけさ

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Where are you from?
Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
translation.ja: イリノイ州ウィネトカだ

translation.en: Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
it didn't really wash.
What about you? Where are you from?
Where am I from?
Memphis.
So, what's a good-looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.ja: 君のような美男がなぜカネで相手を買う？

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street? Harold to the 1-2-3...
translation.ja: ハッテン場に行けばモテるだろう

translation.en: Cookie, you're making me nervous. [chuckles]
Relax.
I'll take good care of you.
Uh, I went down there once, but... I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
translation.ja: 一度 行ったけど知ってる人がいたから

translation.en: A casting director. So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.ja: 配役担当の人だから顔を覚えられたくなかった

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm... that way.
translation.ja: だから先入観を持たれたくないんだ

translation.en: [Archie] I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera. That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.ja: 俺は顔を出さない仕事で助かったよ

translation.en: -That's why I'm a writer. -A writer? You don't say.
Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.ja: 大手スタジオに審査されてる

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.ja: 大手で採用されたら黒人初だよ

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.ja: 今までにも黒人脚本家はいたが―

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.ja: 黒人向け映画しか書いてない

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.ja: 上映できる場所も限られる

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.ja: だが俺の脚本は白人が主役だ

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
translation.ja: ロイ 出演したいか？

translation.en: Could you imagine something like that?
translation.ja: そんなの ありえるか？まるで…

translation.en: -That would be-- -A dream.
translation.ja: そんなの ありえるか？まるで… 夢だ

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah.
In Dreamland.
And if it comes true?
When it comes...
true.
We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
translation.ja: この出会いがハリウッドドリームの始まり

translation.en: There you go, Jack.
Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.ja: ビリー サミーロニー グレン

translation.en: Goody Two-Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.ja: ビリー サミーロニー グレン アーチー 歓迎する

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right?
[clears throat] It's nothing. It's nothing. This black walnut blooms this time of year.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ黒グルミの季節だな

translation.en: Let's make it another great week, fellas!
-[workers] Yes, sir! -Go get 'em. All right.
-What'll it be? -Dreamland.
-Where to? -Dreamland.
-Where to for you? -Dreamland.
Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
So is this what you do, full time?
No, uh, just to make ends meet.
I'm an actor.
Really?
I'm in casting.
[Jack] Excuse me, sorry.
Pardon me.
Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.ja: しばらく見ないから夢を諦めたと思ったよ

translation.en: -No, still pounding the pavement. -Sure, sure. That's great.
Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.ja: 俺はフレームワイプの仕事をしてた　知ってる？

translation.en: -Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? -Sure.
translation.ja: 俺はフレームワイプの仕事をしてた　知ってる？ ああ

translation.en: I walk right next to the camera, real close, and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.ja: カメラの近くを横切る俺をカットに使うんだ

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
translation.ja: 実質 編集の仕事だ おい 来たぞ

translation.en: Okay. -I need three warm bodies. -[crowd clamoring]
You, you and... you.
translation.ja: あなた あなた 最後に あなた

translation.en: That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
translation.ja: 今日は以上よ　また明日

translation.en: Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
[Jack] No, I think I'm gonna stick around.
What are you talking about?
Jack?
Get in here.
What the hell's going on?
Oh, I, uh, I got a walk-on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture. Might get a line!
translation.ja: セシル･Ｂ･デミル作品の端役をもらった

translation.en: Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.ja: 君にも いつかチャンスが来るさ

translation.en: How are you?
[exhales] I love this town.
Hello, sweetheart.
What are you doing?
Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
Hungry?
No, suspicious.
What did you do?
Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
We're celebrating.
Celebrating what?
You quitting your job.
-What? I like working at Schwab's! -I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.ja: 仕事は好きよ 体に良くない

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.ja: 妊娠３ヵ月だ　休むべきだよ

translation.en: Not another word about it.
Let's eat.
Just eat!
-God. -That's $500.
How-- How did you get this?
I've been doing good work at the gas station.
Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
translation.ja: 家賃も電気代も払った

translation.en: Now, that ain't for spending, all right? That's a down-payment... on a house.
translation.ja: 無駄遣いせずマイホームの頭金にしよう

translation.en: Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
I thought that's what you wanted.
[laughing] It is, I just can't believe it!
Oh, my God!
Thank you! Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう ジャック

translation.en: Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.ja: 家族のためなら何でもする

translation.en: What does that mean, "sexually ambidextrous"?
That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.ja: スタン君は男も女もイケるってことさ

translation.en: Huh, no fooling? Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
translation.ja: 本当に？よろしくな スタン

translation.en: -[bell dings] -Thanks.
All yours, Jack.
-Fill 'er up? -Dreamland.
-Hello. -How are you?
-Better now, thank you. -Glad to hear it.
Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.ja: 支払いはアーニーへ直接もらわない

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
translation.ja: 満足したら ちょうだい

translation.en: Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
Okay, thanks.
-You're under arrest. -What?
Got him!
Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
translation.ja: どういうことだ？　待って

translation.en: -Wait a minute, wait! -[officer] Shut up!
translation.ja: どういうことだ？　待って 黙れ

translation.en: You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
translation.ja: 売春勧誘の罪で逮捕する

translation.en: pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647-B.
translation.ja: カリフォルニア刑法647Ｂ条違反よ
